params.router: Address of the router to authorize

params.token: Address of the token to authorize

params.reverseOrder: Whether to reverse order on router2

params.token: Address of the token to deposit
Address of the token to withdraw

params.amountIn: Amount of token A to swap
params.reverseOrder: Whether to reverse the swap order on router2

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.router: Address of the router to revoke

params.token: Address of the token to revoke

params.slippage: New maximum slippage in basis points

params.threshold: New minimum profit threshold in wei

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawProfit(address,uint256).details: Withdraw profits in a specific token

params.token: Address of the token to withdraw
